title: Allocation of Provision Required for the Payment of Salaries of the Employees and Incurring other Expenses of Kantale Sugar Company Ltd
decision_details: - presently a staff of 39 has been employed for the protection / maintenance of the assets belonging to the Kantale Sugar Company Limited and its other essential functions. The proposal made by Hon. M.K.A.D.S. Gunawardana, Minister of Lands, to obtain provision to pay their salaries and other allowances, was approved by the Cabinet.
